page.title: 07EMPLOYMENT IN PARR.
page.content: The topic we decided to cover was Employment. We went around the Fingerpost area of St.Helens and asked people the following questions. 1"Do you think that the Youth Training Scheme is giving young people a taste of working life?". Ten people replied "Yes", six replied "No". 2"What do you think will stop the falling rate of employment?". Eight people thought more investment was the answer. 3"Compared to other parts of the country, do you think St.Helens has a high or low employment rate". Fifteen people replied "Low", one person replied "High". 4"Do you think to much money is spent on Defence when it could be put to better use?". Nine people replied "Yes", seven people replied "No".
